summary: <SOH> SUMMARY OF THE INVENTION <EOH>In one embodiment, the invention relates to a method for providing cognitive insights via a cognitive information processing system comprising: receiving data from a plurality of data sources; receiving and processing queries; and, bridging the queries into a cognitive graph.
title: Method for Performing Graph Query Operations within a Cognitive Environment
abstract: A method for providing cognitive insights via a cognitive information processing system comprising: receiving data from a plurality of data sources; receiving and processing queries; and, bridging the queries into a cognitive graph.
